origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_risk_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves research reports on financial loan risk management strategies, including specific reports from a given year and quarter.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial company, e.g., loan, banking.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report, e.g., risk_management, performance.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year of the report.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The quarter of the report, e.g., Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The list of retrieved reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_risk_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyType'是'loan', 'reportType'是'risk_management', 'year'是'2023', 'quarter'是'Q3'.
